title: Mercury
text: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun and the smallest in our solar system.

title: Venus
text: Venus is the second planet from the Sun and has a thick, toxic atmosphere.

title: Earth
text: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only known planet to support life.

title: Mars
text: Mars is the fourth planet and is known as the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

title: Jupiter
text: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system and has a giant red storm.

title: Saturn
text: Saturn is famous for its beautiful ring system and is the sixth planet from the Sun.

title: Uranus
text: Uranus is an ice giant with a bluish color due to methane in its atmosphere.

title: Neptune
text: Neptune is the farthest planet from the Sun and has strong winds and storms.
